alert.note: Alert for Big Island North; Kahoolawe; Kohala; Lanai Leeward; Lanai Mauka; Lanai Windward; Maui Central Valley North; Maui Central Valley South; Maui Leeward West; Maui Windward West; South Haleakala (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued June 24 at 3:01AM HST until June 25 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FOR BIG ISLAND MAUI LANAI AND KAHOOLAWE FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 6 PM SUNDAY... .High pressure north of the state will keep windy trades blowing through the weekend. ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 6 PM HST SUNDAY... * WHAT...East winds 20 to 30 mph with localized gusts up to 50 mph. * WHERE...Portions of the Big Island, Maui, Lanai and Kahoolawe. * WHEN...From 10 AM this morning to 6 PM HST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Winds this strong can knock down tree branches, blow around tents and other unsecured objects, and make it difficult to drive, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Watch out for falling tree branches when walking or driving. Make sure tents and awnings are secure or take them down. Be prepared for power outages.
